name: part_005
file: tmp_異次元フェス開催記念音楽番組　MUSIC BIGBANG！ [wUQ61OVMU2A]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Dola's solo cover performance of Yohane's song 'in this unstable world'.
Transition with the 'MUSIC BIGBANG!' logo and program title.
MC section where Dola and Yoshiko Tsushima (Yohane) talk about covering each other's songs.
Duet performance of 'Strawberry Trapper' by Yohane and Dola.

subtitles.original: 全てのリトルデーモンに捧げる
subtitles.english: Dedicated to all Little Demons

subtitles.original: 堕天の力を！
subtitles.english: The power of the Fallen!

subtitles.original: Switch
subtitles.english: Switch

subtitles.original: 聖なるセカイ夢見てるの？
subtitles.english: Are you dreaming of a holy world?

subtitles.original: 白い翼を背にしたいの？
subtitles.english: Do you want white wings on your back?

subtitles.original: でも貴方とアナタと私達
subtitles.english: But you and you and us

subtitles.original: 無垢なままではいられない
subtitles.english: Can't stay innocent forever

subtitles.original: この退屈セカイを渡るには
subtitles.english: To traverse this tedious world

subtitles.original: 力を合わせなきゃ駄目よ
subtitles.english: We must join our forces

subtitles.original: ほら私と貴方とワタシなら
subtitles.english: See, if it's me, you and I

subtitles.original: やがて奇跡が起きちゃうって！
subtitles.english: A miracle will surely happen!

subtitles.original: だけど今は我慢しようか
subtitles.english: But for now, let's be patient

subtitles.original: 伏伏の時 タイミング待ってる
subtitles.english: A time of dormancy, waiting for the timing

subtitles.original: いつかどこか私と貴方
subtitles.english: Someday, somewhere, you and I

subtitles.original: 出会う筈でしょ unstable world
subtitles.english: Are bound to meet, unstable world

subtitles.original:
異次元フェス開催記念音楽番組
MUSIC BIGBANG!
subtitles.english:
Other-Dimensional Fest Commemorative Music Program
MUSIC BIGBANG!

subtitles.original: はぁ～ 皆さんどうでしたか？
subtitles.english: Haa~ How was it, everyone?

subtitles.original: 私たち「ヨハドラ」チームも お互いの曲をカバーさせてもらいました！
subtitles.english: Our "Yohadora" team also covered each other's songs!

subtitles.original: ドーラ、良かったわ！
subtitles.english: Dola, that was great!

subtitles.original: とっても新鮮だった！
subtitles.english: It was very fresh!

subtitles.original: でも あなたの曲も難しかった...
subtitles.english: But your song was difficult too...

subtitles.original: うう、ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Uu, thank you very much!

subtitles.original: ヨハネの曲が歌えて めちゃくちゃ楽しかったです！
subtitles.english: It was so much fun to sing Yohane's song!

subtitles.original: そう、ドーラのこの「レッドルーラー」めちゃめちゃ難しいんですけど
subtitles.english: Yes, Dola's "Red Ruler" is incredibly difficult, but...

subtitles.original: ヨハネ 完璧に歌い上げてて 聴き惚れちゃいました
subtitles.english: Yohane sang it perfectly, I was mesmerized

subtitles.original: さすがです！
subtitles.english: As expected!

subtitles.original: ククククッ...
subtitles.english: Kukukuku...

subtitles.original: でもドーラ
subtitles.english: But Dola

subtitles.original: この程度で リトルデーモンは満足しないわ
subtitles.english: Little Demons won't be satisfied with just this

subtitles.original: はい、その通り！
subtitles.english: Yes, exactly!

subtitles.original: さあ 私たちの歌声に酔いしれなさい！
subtitles.english: Now, be intoxicated by our singing voices!

subtitles.original: それでは 聴いてください
subtitles.english: Now, please listen

subtitles.original: ストロベリー・トラッパー！
subtitles.english: Strawberry Trapper!

subtitles.original: Ready?
subtitles.english: Ready?

subtitles.original: 待ってないよ... LOVE!!
subtitles.english: I'm not waiting... LOVE!!

subtitles.original: 見つけた！キミは 淋しい瞳だった
subtitles.english: Found you! You had lonely eyes

subtitles.original: 鼓動が鳴ってる「手に入れなさい」と
subtitles.english: My heart is beating, saying "Take it"

subtitles.original: 冷静なほど 熱さを楽しめるの
subtitles.english: The cooler you are, the more you can enjoy the heat

subtitles.original: 高まる想いは 抑えて
subtitles.english: Suppress your rising feelings

subtitles.original: 静かに 集めるキミの情報
subtitles.english: Quietly gather information about you

subtitles.original: 確かに 価値ある Sensitive mind
subtitles.english: Surely, a valuable Sensitive mind

subtitles.original: 背後に歩み寄る スリルがたまらない
subtitles.english: The thrill of approaching from behind is irresistible

subtitles.original: 狙い定めたら 逃がさないから
subtitles.english: Once I've aimed, I won't let you get away

subtitles.original: 逃がさないから My target!!
subtitles.english: I won't let you get away, My target!!

subtitles.original: (Trap in Dice) 恋の罠から
subtitles.english: (Trap in Dice) From the trap of love

subtitles.original: (Trap in Night) 始まりたい
subtitles.english: (Trap in Night) I want to begin

subtitles.original: (Trap in Heart) 踊りながら人生のルーレット
subtitles.english: (Trap in Heart) Dancing through the roulette of life

subtitles.original: (運命は) ありきたりじゃつまらない
subtitles.english: (Fate is) Boring if it's ordinary

subtitles.original: 特別を感じたいの 奪いたいキミのこと
subtitles.english: I want to feel special, I want to steal you away

subtitles.original: 奪いたいキミのこと
subtitles.english: I want to steal you away

subtitles.original: 待ってないよ... LOVE!!
subtitles.english: I'm not waiting... LOVE!!

subtitles.original: 震える顔が 見たいのなんてさ
subtitles.english: Saying I want to see your trembling face...

subtitles.original: 企むときは きっとワルイ顔ね
subtitles.english: When I'm plotting, I'm sure I have a wicked face

subtitles.original: いただきたいのは...その心よ
subtitles.english: What I want to take... is your heart

subtitles.original: 脆くて危うい 優しさ
subtitles.english: Fragile and precarious kindness

subtitles.original: 静かな孤独を愛するキミ
subtitles.english: You who love quiet solitude

subtitles.original: 確かな 輝き放つの
subtitles.english: Radiating a certain brilliance

subtitles.original: 気づかれないうちに 私のモノにしたい
subtitles.english: I want to make you mine before you notice

subtitles.original: 狙い定めたよ 逃がさないから
subtitles.english: I've aimed, I won't let you get away

subtitles.original: 逃がさないから My target!!
subtitles.english: I won't let you get away, My target!!

subtitles.original: (Trick in Dice) 恋に賭けたら
subtitles.english: (Trick in Dice) If you bet on love

subtitles.original: (Trick in Night) 後に引けない
subtitles.english: (Trick in Night) There's no turning back

subtitles.original: (Trick in Heart) 勝つだけでしょ人生はルーレット
subtitles.english: (Trick in Heart) You just have to win, life is a roulette

subtitles.original: (運命と) わかる出会い素敵だわ
subtitles.english: (As fate) A meeting that reveals itself is wonderful

subtitles.original: 特別を感じたら
subtitles.english: If you feel something special

subtitles.original: ドーラ、召喚！
subtitles.english: Dola, summon!

subtitles.original: 「手に入れて」秘めたる声はberryの香り Trap in one night
subtitles.english: "Take it" the hidden voice smells like berry, Trap in one night

subtitles.original: 赤いberry 甘く強く... 滴って
subtitles.english: Red berry, sweet and strong... dripping
